title: sharavaNabava guha
sahitya:
sharavaNabhava guha SaNmukha tiruvaruL puriya vA vA

anupallavi

maruvum vaLLi dEvayAnai maNALA karuNai mazhai pozhiya vA dayALA
caraNam

kunrutOrum Adum kumaranE vA kuraigaL tIrttiDa viraivinil nI vA 
ennum inbam tarum tamizhishaikka vA irangi engaLukku jnAnam tazhaikka vA
